name: The Maidens Dungeon - v1.0 Beta
description:
The Maidens Dungeon - v1.0 Beta

The Maidens Dungeon is a 2D Pixel Art Side Scrolling Platformer. You play as an exiled cultist who must survive the horrors of a cursed dungeon you've been sealed inside of. After an accident during your attempt to bring an ancient Iron Maiden to life and losing control of it, you're sent back to the dungeon to deal with it alone after facing the disapproval of the head cultist. After you've dealt with the Iron Maiden however, you know you still have a long journey ahead of you to escape the cult and all the horrors that come with it.

This demo shows off an early build of just the boss fight, so there's a lot that needs changing, however think of this as a proof of concept for the rest of the game and what could be of the final version etc.

Made in Unreal Engine 4 by:  Zachariah Barrance

With Pixel Art and Animations by:  Ethan Hayward

Music and Sounds obtained from ZapSplat and YouTube
